Resume.name: Anonymous T01
Resume.summary:
Sr. Project Manager with a proven track record of successful projects specializing in the areas of Banking System implementations, BI management consulting and BI report development.
Energetic and enthusiastic consultant well versed in high profile strategic project management and technical implementations. Responsible for the management of large scale banking system implementations, reporting projects and/or the development of reporting architecture and implementation strategies. 
Extensive application development using a variety of Oracle Hyperion reporting tools. Over twenty years of banking and information systems experience. Skilled at learning new concepts quickly, working well under pressure, and communicating ideas clearly and effectively.
Specialties: Project Management, BI Reporting architecture and development, IT/Technical management, Customer relations, Sales and marketing presentations, International/Domestic banking applications and implementations, Oracle/Hyperion (Brio) Interactive Reporting (IR), Dashboards, Web Analysis(WA), Production Reporting(SQR), Financial Reporting(FR), Smart View, Oracle Business Intelligence (OBIEE) Answers, Internet/Intranet Development, Working Knowledge of Essbase (OLAP) and Relational Database platforms

experience.e_activities: Responsible for overall coordination, status reporting, financial reporting, and stability of complex and cross functional project oriented work efforts. Responsibilities include managing multiple projects and/or integrated projects simultaneously. Establishes and implements industry best practice project management processes and methodologies to ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, adhere to high quality standards and meet or exceed the needs of clients. Negotiates and communicates changes regarding the scope, budget or schedule of the project; acts as the final decision-maker during all stages of the project life-cycle.

Provide Project Management services in the areas of AML (Anti-Money Laundering), Banking System Implementation and Conversion primarily for users of the Fiserv Signature (CBS) banking system. \nProvide management consulting on implementing BI and developing best practices with regard to business intelligence. \nDevelopment of reporting applications using a variety of Oracle Hyperion (Brio) tools including Interactive Reporting (IR), Web Analysis(WA), Financial Reporting (HFR), and Production Reporting for clients in the finance industry, public sector, defense industry, and manufacturing.

Project Manager – core conversion. Responsible for the project management of a bank acquisition and the integration of the acquired banks accounts to the Fiserv Signature system. Responsibilities include: Bank Common file integration, data conversion, Fiserv Signature core deposits, Fiserv Signature core loans, statements and product regionalization.\nProject Manager for Lawson company consolidation.\nProject Manager for the integration of Promontory Interfinancial Network CDARS-ICS products allowing the bank to expand their product offerings to high net worth customers.
Assist large manaufacturing company with the development and creation of Hyperion Financial Reports.

experience.e_job: Contract Project Manager - Anti Money Laundering (AML)
experience.e_activities: Managed the implementation of NICE-Actimize Anti-Money Laundering AML system that was delivered on time and on budget. Actimize Anti-Money Laundering (AML) solutions automate, streamline, and drive down the costs of their enterprise AML compliance system.

Developed reporting applications using a variety of Oracle Hyperion (Brio) tools including Interactive Reporting, Web Analysis, Financial Reporting, and Production Reporting for clients in the finance industry, public sector, defense industry, and manufacturing. Reports were created against various database sources such as Essbase OLAP and Oracle 10g data sources. Developed dashboards and portals using IR Dashboard Development tools and JavaScript.

Provided consulting services to financial institutions and banking software vendors in the areas of conversion/de-conversion and data warehouse reporting. Implemented Hyperion Performance Suite for a data warehouse product developed by a major banking software vendor for use by both domestic and international banks and financial institutions. Developed all dashboards and reports released as part of the data warehouse application above and provided technical consultation to internal staff on Hyperion Performance suite client and server applications. Conducted training classes on HPS client and server installations and operations. Provided technical sales consultation for current and potential clients on Hyperion Performance Suite.

Headed up a group created to improve the quality and timeliness of information throughout the company. Implemented an Intranet “portal” that provided employees with up to date information on everything from people’s phone numbers to maps of where people actually sat within the building. Directed the research, selection and implementation of knowledge management tools, such as document management, implementing Lotus Domino.doc. Served as liaison between the operations group and the other functional departments to effectively implement knowledge management, Internet and Intranet initiatives. Directed development staff in the day to day development and enhancements requested by other departments using Lotus Notes/Domino and Internet/Intranet development tools and platforms.
Founded and managed an Internet solutions company. Grew the business so that at one point it employed a staff of 10 full time or part time people and had a customer base of 60-70 customers.

Served as Sr. VP in charge of Internet and Intranet Applications, Responsibilities included management of the development and implementation of internet sites for all FiTech customers. Other duties were conducting sales presentations and sales support and the development of project plans, customer start-up plans, internet site design, coding and implementations.

Managed Orlando based computer operations. Systems included four AS/400 models, and six LAN servers running on Novell 4.1, Windows NT, and internet applications. These systems directly supported between 250 - 300 users (7X24 support). Managed all support personnel including support technicians, computer operations, help desk, and security personnel.

Various positions within the company included:
Security/Systems Manager 1993 – 1994 
Transaction Delivery Manager	1991 – 1993 
Sr. Installations Manager - CIR UK/Europe 1990 – 1991 
Project Manager – POD,	1989 – 1990 
Sr. Installations Specialist 1986 – 1989 
Implemented in excess of 75 installations in 7 years.
Key member of Fiserv corporate internet group to determine corporate internet policies, procedures, connectivity, and implementation strategies.

Provided direct support for an in-house banking system. Acted as liaison between client bank and programmer/analysts to assist in pre-conversion testing and the actual conversion process. Provided training in the operation of the OMNI software system and the IBM System 34/36 and IBM 1255 and 3694 reader sorters. Assisted in the development of 3694 item capture software and defining enhancements to improve marketability of the system.
playing with Azure Service Fabric, Service Bus, Message Queuing, Azure Functions, Akka .net Angular 4 , SSRS, and finally xamarin
.Net Core, WebApi, Angular 4, Angular Material, Azure, VSTS, Git, Cloud Computing, SiteCore

I am working with the team of Mobile solutions, giving the support to Web API (restful services) and Also working with new technologies, such as NServiceBus, Akka, Kafka, MongoDB, CouchBase, AngularJS, Kendo, and Microservices.

Team lead, working among the team of Mexico, Canada, and the USA, and also giving the support to several application such as MVC, Silverlight , third party software and gathering information with vendors.

Deloitte with DEO (Department of business opportunities) in this place I had the chance to work with a system of insurance unemployment.  TransCanada Corporation, I was working as part of the IS Tools & Integration US team.

Resume.name: Anonymous T02
Resume.summary: Cesar is a Sr.Net professional with 10 years of experience , He has developing web applications and desktop application using Microsoft technologies He has working in the full Software Development Life Cycle including Requirements Analysis, High Level Design, Detailed Design, Build, Testing, Security, Acceptance and Installation, Maintenance and Production Support carried out several .Net roles as a technical leader, lead developer and technical consultant in the TI, Government, financial, Entertainment and media sectors. As a .NET Technical Lead/Architect he also has experience on each activity of the SDLC such as requirements gathering and analysis with uses cases and user stories, OO analysis and design using severalUML diagrams, OO developing with design patterns (such as Singleton, Abstract Factory and Factory Method, Dependency Injection,Memento, MVC,MVVM), functional testing with Mercury Quality Center 9.0, Test Manager, QT Pro, unit testingand Continuous Delivery using TFS 2012 , 2010 and N-UNIT. He also has experience working and incorporating best practices and agile methodologies such as SCRUM, rup and cmmi.

experience.e_activities:
LEAD CAMPAIGN SPECIALIST - TRIGGERS

TARGETED EMAIL
I build complex targeted HTML email campaigns for the Sears and Kmart brands. Projects involve hand coding HTML/CSS/SQL, data filtering, writing conditional statements for dynamic deployment, pre-flighting, format CSS for proper mobile rendering, cross device and browser testing.

ORGANIC SEO STRATEGIES\nImplemented strategies to improve website visibility that met conversion objectives. Established KPI and metric parameters for reporting. Created documentation for client's future SEO and interactive marketing practices.
